constructor-arg.value:
<bean id="maserviceServiceInfo" class="java.util.HashMap"> <constructor-arg> <map> <entry key="APPLICATION_SERVICE_BEAN" value-ref="maserviceApplicationService"/> <entry key="AUTHENTICATION_SERVICE_BEAN" value-ref="maserviceAuthenticationManager"/> </map> </constructor-arg> </bean>
<bean id="maserviceInterceptor" class="gov.nih.nci.system.client.proxy.ApplicationServiceProxy" singleton="true"> <property name="proxyFactory"> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.client.proxy.ProxyHelperImpl"/> </property> </bean>
<bean id="maserviceApplicationService" class="org.springframework.aop.framework.ProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="target"> <bean class="org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceUrl" value="URL_KEY/http/applicationService"/> <property name="serviceInterface" value="gov.nih.nci.system.applicationservice.MaApplicationService"/> <property name="httpInvokerRequestExecutor"> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.GSIHttpInvokerRequestExecutor"/> </property> </bean> </property> <property name="interceptorNames" value="maserviceInterceptor"/> <property name="interfaces" value="gov.nih.nci.system.applicationservice.MaApplicationService"/> </bean>
<bean id="maserviceAuthenticationManager" class="org.acegisecurity.providers.ProviderManager"> <property name="providers"> <list> <bean class="org.acegisecurity.providers.rcp.RemoteAuthenticationProvider"> <property name="remoteAuthenticationManager"> <bean class="org.springframework.remoting.httpinvoker.HttpInvokerProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceUrl" value="URL_KEY/http/remoteAuthenticationManager"/> <property name="serviceInterface" value="org.acegisecurity.providers.rcp.RemoteAuthenticationManager"/> </bean> </property> </bean> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.security.acegi.providers.NullGroupNameAuthenticationProvider"/> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.security.acegi.providers.NullX509AuthenticationProvider"/> <bean class="gov.nih.nci.system.security.acegi.providers.NullUsernameAuthenticationProvider"/> </list> </property> </bean>
<alias alias="ServiceInfo" name="maserviceServiceInfo"/>
